name: Material Black Cursor
description: Just a simple cursor that can be used on any website as long as you use a browser with Stylish installed.
css:
/*by Kechioma, you can easily swap this out with other cursors by going to the link at the end of this css!*/

/* Start http://www.cursors-4u.com */ body, a:hover {cursor: url(http://cur.cursors-4u.net/cursors/cur-5/cur425.cur), progress !important;} /* End http://www.cursors-4u.com */
